oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sut Lovingood's old home
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: W.W. Mynatt Collection-Sut Lovingood's old home
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: C. Kinzel
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sut Lovingood's old home (writer George Washington Harris, 1814-1869). Old Main Street, Knoxville, TN. September 3, 1886. C. Kinzel, Photographer. Children on sidewalk.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Houses; Children; African Americans;
